## Open data portals

| Portal             | What you get                                                                            |
|---------------------------|---------------------------------------------|
| **Natural Earth**  | Global vector & raster (1:10 m / 1:50 m / 1:110 m) — <https://www.naturalearthdata.com> |
| **OpenStreetMap**  | Volunteered geographic data; download via QuickOSM or the `osmextract` R package        |
| **Copernicus Hub** | Sentinel satellite imagery — <https://scihub.copernicus.eu>                             |
